title: Jo Stevens – 2020 Comments on Government Support for Live Music Venues
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jo Stevens, the Shadow Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport, on 21 August 2020.
content:
The government is claiming that this long overdue money will save the UK’s much-loved live music venues, but this is merely a short-term fix.
